>>> header_range
bytes=

<<< http_headers
HTTP/1.1 200 OK
Content-Length: 40
Content-Type: text/html; charset=utf-8

<<< http_body
<html><body>Hello, world!</body></html>


<<< all_body
<html><body>Hello, world!</body></html>


<<< END
